description:
You bring the passion, motivation, and drive, and Aimbridge Hospitality will bring the opportunities! Aimbridge will get you where you want to go and help you reach places in your career you might have never imagined were possible! When you join the Aimbridge Family, you’re working with the best of the best! It’s a mark of distinction. Our diverse business is full of energy, excitement, and rapid growth—just like a career with Aimbridge! Join a team where every day brings new opportunities to help create memorable experiences, ways to succeed, and great people to inspire you. We are a place to GROW, a place to BELONG, and a place to SUCCEED! That is #theAimbridgeWAY!

Aimbridge Hospitality is actively recruiting for a remote Area Senior Sales Manager to help grow topline for a portfolio of 20 select service hotels! This is a remote role with up to 25% travel.

The Area Senior Sales Manager is responsible for attainment of assigned goals tied to the overall performance of the assigned collection of hotels. The individual will be responsible for effectively soliciting and securing new accounts. The Senior Sales Manager will work in conjunction with the properties' Director of Sales and Regional Vice-President of Sales to achieve the hotels' revenue and market share goals. The focus of sales may vary based on the respective property the associate is assigned to (i.e. Leisure Business Travel Group SMERF). This role will also serve as a mentor/trainer for members of the Sales team. Management-level associates are expected to work as much of each workday as is necessary to complete their job responsibilities; for OEM associates overtime does apply and is calculated accordingly.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Remote work with minimum of 25% travel to property and/or trade shows
• Identify and pursue new business opportunities, cultivating relationships with corporate clients, travel agencies, meeting planners, among others that handle travel for accounts that touch 25% of the total portfolio of hotels
• Recognize gaps of business opportunities within the portfolio to be able to target and grow revenue (ie. entertainment, sports, government, business travel)
• Proactively conduct solicitation calls, sales tours, and entertain clients specific to the business generated by this position as applicable by each hotel within the portfolio
• Review types of events happening in each market to target for potential groups and/or ensure proper eCommerce marketing is set up for the hotel(s)
• Monitor and evaluate trends within the portfolio and prospect accordingly based on market share opportunities within the negotiated and group sectors
• Qualify business opportunities until time of bidding, then communicate with on property team and assist in conversion
• Plan, coordinate, and track sales goal results and portfolio benchmarks
• Support executions of Aimbridge National Sales initiatives throughout portfolio
• Represent portfolio of hotels at trade shows (with or without Aimbridge National Sales) that with will provide financial benefits to 25% or more of the portfolio
• Communicate sales updates to Regional Vice President of Sales
• Attend scheduled monthly calls with NSO to review leads for hotels and discuss lead/booking trends for proactive focus

WHO WE ARE

As the global leader in third-party hotel management, our growing portfolio represents over 1,550 hotels in all 50 states and 22 countries, from top international lodging brands to luxury hotels, destination resorts and lifestyle hotels. Our associates around the globe are passionate about serving our guests and driving exceptional results, and thrive in a culture where everyone is inspired to be the best. Join a world of possibility with Aimbridge Hospitality.

BENEFITS

After an initial waiting period, those hired into full time positions are eligible for a competitive benefits package that includes the following:
• Now offering Daily Pay! Ask your Recruiter for more details
• Medical, Dental, and Vision Coverage
• Short-Term and Long-Term Disability Income
• Term Life and AD&D Insurance
• Paid Time Off
• Employee Assistance Program
• 401k Retirement Plan
